title: Handwoven Macrame Wall Hanging
description: Beautiful bohemian wall art handcrafted with natural cotton cord. Features intricate knotwork patterns and wooden beads. Perfect for adding texture and warmth to any room.

title: Ceramic Coffee Mug Set
description: Set of 4 handthrown ceramic mugs with earthy glazes. Each mug is unique with slight variations that showcase the artisan's touch. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

title: Hand-Knitted Wool Scarf
description: Cozy merino wool scarf hand-knitted with a beautiful cable pattern. Available in natural earth tones. Soft, warm, and perfect for cold weather.

title: Wooden Cutting Board
description: Premium hardwood cutting board crafted from sustainable walnut. Features juice groove and comfortable grip. Treated with food-safe mineral oil finish.

title: Handmade Leather Journal
description: Artisan-crafted leather journal with hand-stitched binding. Features aged leather cover and cream-colored paper. Perfect for writing, sketching, or journaling.

title: Woven Basket Storage Set
description: Set of 3 handwoven baskets in graduated sizes. Made from sustainable rattan with natural finish. Perfect for organizing and adding rustic charm to your home.

title: Artisan Soap Gift Set
description: Collection of 6 handmade soaps with natural ingredients. Includes lavender, eucalyptus, honey oat, charcoal, rose, and vanilla scents. Beautiful gift packaging included.

title: Hand-Painted Ceramic Vase
description: Unique ceramic vase featuring hand-painted floral motifs. Each piece is one-of-a-kind with vibrant colors and artistic flair. Perfect for fresh or dried flowers.

title: Embroidered Throw Pillow
description: Decorative pillow with intricate hand-embroidered design. Features floral patterns in earth tones on natural linen fabric. Includes premium down insert.

title: Handcrafted Wooden Spoons
description: Set of 5 handcarved wooden spoons made from cherry wood. Each spoon has a unique grain pattern and smooth finish. Perfect for cooking and serving.

title: Crocheted Baby Blanket
description: Soft and cozy baby blanket hand-crocheted with organic cotton yarn. Features delicate shell stitch pattern in soft pastels. Machine washable and hypoallergenic.

title: Hand-Forged Iron Candle Holders
description: Pair of rustic candle holders hand-forged by skilled metalworkers. Features twisted iron design with antique finish. Fits standard taper candles perfectly.
